name: Marin Transit: Paratransit
fullDescription: Marin Transit provides ADA paratransit service for Marin County residents who cannot use regular local bus service due to a disability.
whatTheyOffer:
- Door-to-door shared ride service
- Service throughout Marin County
- Advance reservations required
- Wheelchair accessible vehicles
- Personal care attendants ride free
howToGetIt:
1. Complete the Marin Transit paratransit application
2. Application available at marintransit.org
3. In-person assessment may be required
4. Once certified, schedule rides by phone
keywords: Marin Transit, paratransit, ADA, Marin County, disability, wheelchair, door to door, San Rafael
